info.title: UiTdatabank v3
info.description:
Version 3 of the UiTdatabank, a central database of cultural offers in the Flanders region.

Most operations require that you authenticate first with your UiTID.

post.summary: Create a new cultural event.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the necessary information to create a new cultural event.

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the cultural event.

url.description: The URL of the cultural event.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The data required for the copied event

eventId.description: The unique identifier of the cultural event.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing major info for an event.

get.summary: View the change log / history of a specific place.
Search organizers

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the organizer to be used for fuzzy search

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: The url of the organizer website

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of organizers included in the result set. When omitted it defaults to 30 items.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of organizers to skip from the start of the result set.

parameters.description: The command info required to create an organizer.

200.description: The active distibution keys for the UiTPAS event

400.description: There is an error in the request.

put.summary: Update an UiTPAS event's distribution keys

400.description: There is an error in the request.

404.description: The offer with the specified identifier was not found.

403.description: The user is not allowed to edit this UiTPAS event.

post.summary: Add a new variation of an existing event.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Original URL of the event and a custom description

400.description: There is an error in the request.

get.summary: List variations.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Limit the list to variations owned by a particular user. Specify the user's universally unique identifier.

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: Limit the list to variations with this purpose.

parameters.name: same_as
parameters.description: Limit the list to variations of this event url.

200.description: A list of variations matching the supplied criteria.

get.summary: View the details of a specific variation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The universally unique identifier of the variation.

examples.calendarSummary: Every first day of the month

location.name: This is the place to be

examples.creator: evenementen@stad.diksmuide.be

410.description: The variation is no longer available, because it was removed.

404.description: The variation with the specified identifier was not found.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The universally unique identifier of the variation.

410.description: The variation is no longer available, because it was removed.

404.description: The variation with the specified identifier was not found.

403.description: The user is not allowed to delete this variation.

patch.summary: Patch properties of an existing variation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The universally unique identifier of the variation.

400.description: There is an error in the request.

410.description: The variation is no longer available, because it was removed.

404.description: The variation with the specified identifier was not found.

403.description: The user is not allowed to patch this variation.

get.summary: View the details a label

200.description: Info on the command that was queued.

patch.summary: Update label info with one of the available commands

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the command that you want applied to the label.

get.summary: Retrieve labels for a given search query with a given start and limit.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the label(s) to search (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of labels included in the result set. When omitted it returns all matching labels.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of labels to skip from the start of the result set. When omitted it starts from the first position.

post.summary: Create a new label

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the required information for the creation of a label.

get.summary: Retrieve roles, optionally filtered by name, with a given start and limit.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the role(s) to search (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of roles included in the result set. When omitted it returns all matching roles.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of roles to skip from the start of the result set. When omitted it starts from the first position.

post.summary: Create a new role.
post.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the required fields of a role.

roleId.description: The unique identifier of the created role.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific role by its id
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

delete.summary: Delete a specific role by its id
delete.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

patch.summary: Update a specific role by its id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the required information for the update of the name of a role. The RenameRole model requires a 'name' body parameter.

post.summary: Add a constraint to the role.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the required constraint for the sapiVersion of a role.

put.summary: Updates a constraint to the role.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the required constraint for the sapiVersion of a role.

delete.summary: Removes a constraint to the role.

put.summary: Add a permission to the role.
put.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

delete.summary: Remove a permission from the role.
delete.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve all labels usable by the role.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

put.summary: Make a label usable by the role.
put.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

delete.summary: Make a label unusable by the role.
delete.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve all users with the given role.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

put.summary: Couple a user to the role.
put.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

delete.summary: Remove a user from the role.
delete.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve all permissions.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve users, optionally filtered by email, with a given start and limit.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A valid email address with a specific domain. The wildcard '*' can be used in the local part.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of roles included in the result set. When omitted it returns all matching roles.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of roles to skip from the start of the result set. When omitted it starts from the first position.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user with the given userId.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user with the given e-mail address.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: The email of the user to retrieve (case-insensitive).

get.summary: Retrieve all roles that the user has.
get.description: Authentication and user management permission are required.

get.summary: Retrieve all the current user's roles.
Retrieve all the current user's permissions
Get a list of existing productions filtered by a search string

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the production(s) to search (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The number of productions to skip from the start of the result set. When omitted it starts from the first position (0).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit of productions included in the result set. When omitted it defaults to 30 items.

post.summary: Combines two (or more) events into a new production

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload to create a new production from existing events

400.description: Invalid or incomplete data was passed to the endpoint

put.summary: Add an event to an existing production.

parameters.name: productionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the production.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

delete.summary: Remove an event from an existing production.

parameters.name: productionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the production.

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the event.

post.summary: Move all events from a existing production to another production.

parameters.name: toProductionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the production where events need to be moved to.

parameters.name: fromProductionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the production where events need to be moved from.

204.description: Events were successfully moved to the new production.

get.summary: Get a list of suggested similar events

200.description: A list of suggested similar events

post.summary: Skip suggestion pair (permanently)

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payload to skip suggestion pair

400.description: Invalid or incomplete data was passed to the endpoint

calendarSummary.example: Every first day of the month

addressCountry.description: The country code of the location.

addressLocality.description: The locality name of the location.

streetAddress.description: The street name and number information of the location.

items.description: A url that points to an offer.
A universally unique identifier for a cultural event.

description.example: This is a description of a cultural event.

label.description: A label name must have a minimum of 2 characters and a maximum of 255 characters and cannot contain a semicolon.

description.example: This is a description of a place.

label.description: A label name must have a minimum of 2 characters and a maximum of 255 characters and cannot contain a semicolon.

owner.description: The universally unique identifier of the owner of the variation. Currently, only the current user's id is supported.

purpose.description: A string describing the purpose of the variation.

same_as.description: URL of the event to create a variation of.

description.description: The alternative description of the event.
description.example: William Kentridge keert terug naar de Met voor zijn eerste nieuwe productie sinds de premire door het gezelschap van The Nose, een opera die voor ophef zorgde bij de opening in 2010. Deze vindingrijke visuele kunstenaar regisseert het schokkende meesterwerk van Berg over een seksueel onweerstaanbare jonge vrouw die met haar losbandige gedrag de ondergang teweegbrengt van al wie zich door haar laat bekoren.

description.description: The alternative description of the event.
description.example: William Kentridge keert terug naar de Met voor zijn eerste nieuwe productie sinds de premire door het gezelschap van The Nose, een opera die voor ophef zorgde bij de opening in 2010. Deze vindingrijke visuele kunstenaar regisseert het schokkende meesterwerk van Berg over een seksueel onweerstaanbare jonge vrouw die met haar losbandige gedrag de ondergang teweegbrengt van al wie zich door haar laat bekoren.

example.calendarSummary: Every first day of the month

location.name: This is the place to be

example.creator: evenementen@stad.diksmuide.be

type.description: One of the event types available at: http://taxonomy.uitdatabank.be/api/domain/eventtype/classification

theme.description: One of the available themes from http://taxonomy.uitdatabank.be/api/domain/theme/classification

domain.description: This is hardcoded to 'thema' in the current application. It is passed to the API and then overwritten.

copyrightHolder.description: The name of the copyright holder.

parentId.description: An optional property that references the parent label.

items.description: The id of the distribution key to use for the cardsystem.

labelIdentifier.name: labelIdentifier
labelIdentifier.description: The unique name or uuid that identifies a label.

labelName.name: labelName
labelName.description: The unique name that identifies a label.

cdbid.name: cdbid
cdbid.description: The unique identifier of an offer. The uuid of older items will deviate from the format specification.

lang.name: lang
lang.description: The unique ISO 639-1 2 character language code.

CommandQueued.description: Info on the command that was queued.

Unauthorized.description: Authentication with UiTID and a valid JWT is required.

Forbidden.description: Access is not allowed for the provided authorization.
